options.description: Sort alignments by the query start coordinate
Sort alignments by the reference start coordinate
Set the screen width - default is terminal width
Set the matrix type - default is 2 (BLOSUM 62)
Space between markers - default is 10, disable with 0 other options include 1 (BLOSUM 45) and 3 (BLOSUM 80) note: only has effect on amino acid alignments
